title: One Piece: Punk Hazard (575-629) - Episode 618: Raid! an Assassin from Dressrosa
author: Crunchyroll
description: Official streaming of Episode 618 with simulcast subtitles. Word of Luffy and Law's alliance spreads throughout the world. Chopper and Brook race to stay ahead of the deadly gas, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar.

title: Baby 5 foreshadowing discussion
author: calgaras
description: A discussion post analyzing Baby 5's character development and how her introduction in Episode 618 foreshadowed her later story arc, particularly regarding Doflamingo's controlling behavior.
